item.title: Judy's First Clutch
item.description:
Female Fucifer pardalis (Panther Chameleons) will rock back and forth with their mouth agape in a defensive posture when they are not ready to mate.
It is always good to introduce the female into the male’s enclosure to avoid injury to either animal because their body language is not for show and males are often too persistent for their own good.
